title: Introduction
content: Mining is also an important part of the game as it allows you to research technologies that provide a significant boost to your stats. It should not be neglected, especially since a rush involves ores, making it even more important to manage this activity well, particularly at the beginning of a server.

title: Drills & bombs
content:
You can buy drills and bombs in the family shop, which are very important for efficient mining. Additionally, you can get 2 drills and 2 bombs for free by watching ads as showed below:



Additionnaly, and especially at the beginning of the game, be sure to buy a maximum of drills and bombs in your family shop, this is how you'll be better than other players.

title: Parking super miner card
content:
You can buy up to 3 super miner cards , each granting 50% more resources for 50 uses within 1 hour (the timer stops if you leave the game, while the pickaxes come back).
A crucial tip: if you use a bomb or a drill on multiple cells, it only counts as one use of the card!

title: What about auto mining ?
content: Auto mining is not recommended, especially beyond 10,000m. It provides a fixed amount of ore without using drills or bombs, resulting in lower efficiency. Avoid using auto mining to maximize your resource gains.

title: Technologies
content:
Always prioritize researching blue technologies first.
These technologies help to accelerate the research time of other technologies, maximizing your efficiency. This is especially important at the beginning of a server to focus on these and stop there to save resources for the rush.

After completing the blue technologies, it's beneficial for any class to balance attack, defense, and HP. However, in the ultra-late game, strategies may differ depending on how you build your class.
